column4: i had problems with amarok and sound in 6.06 - i had to apt-get install libmad0 and libxine-extracodecs. maybe this should be added to http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper#How_to_install_Multimedia_Player_.28amaroK.29 ?
well the problem was mp3-playback so as a restricted format it doesn't fit there i guess
The problem with ubuntuguide is the very fact that it can't be changed. The official Ubuntu help sites (like help.ubuntu.com/community) can be chaged by anyone
